bioAsHtml:
Java developer for 10 years. Currently cloud team leader at MyScript.
Lover of Apache Camel and MongoDB . I am organizer of Nantes MongoDB User Group.

acceptedTalks.title: Bringing handwriting recognition to your webapp with a Polymer component
